attributes.action: Give everyone a extra year at school / universities due to March Lockdown 2020
attributes.additional_details: I want this to happen because loads of people left schools and college without qualifications which they need for jobs in the future
attributes.background: Give everyone in the UK a free year of education because of the massive gap between March and September with students missing out of education

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the impact of the Covid-19 outbreak on education, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We could accept petitions calling on the Government to offer or require school children resit the current academic year, if that is what you want to happen. We could also accept a petition calling on the UK Government to reimburse tuition fees or provide funding for additional education for university students whose studies were affected by Covid-19.
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
